title: 2-3 multi second freezes per game
body: I just installed the game and when I play I get a few freezes per game which are 3-4 seconds long.. otherwise the game is perfectly smooth. My PC should be more than capable of running this game and I do not have any problem in other games.

replies.body:
You can find the requirements to run League here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654
Is your graphics card updated to the latest patch? Do you play on a desktop or a laptop?
Does your FPS drop at all? Some have issues of random frame rate drops to around 1-2 FPS which last for around 3-5 seconds, consistent with your issue.
A freeze is when u have 70-140 FPs (vsynch like me) and then u see 1 Frame for like 0,1s+. After that ur fps is instantly at 70+ again ^^

Got the same problems since i updated from win7 to win10. Little game freezes like 0,1-0,2s so very little but annoying in fights ^^

CPU: Intel core i5 3470 @ 3,6 GHz (normal boost clock)
GPU: Nvidia GTX 970 Zotac amp omega
OS: Win 10 Professional
Newest drivers installed :)

Maybe the prob is here.

You might have outdated drivers that's causing this.  Run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help rule out some possibilities, then test it in a custom game to see if it helps.  Let me know if you have any questions!
